scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -s first -n server,client "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.test:e2e: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:all" http://localhost:5173 "npm run cypress:run"
scripts.start: npm run install:all && npm run test:e2e
